data.name: New Twitter Prettyfied
data.description: Prettyfies the dreaded New Twitter Interface Places a topbar on top of the page like the old layout. Smaller text in the sidebar. Breaks between tweets to make timeline more eligible. Adjusted 'Messages' box Notifications UI improved If you like the Legacy Layout: https://userstyles.org/styles/167861/coffee-twitter-style

data.name: Workflowy Date tags (for use with Complice)
data.description: Make tagged dates pretty. This is designed for use with the unofficial Complice integration, which will automatically pull in the tasks you have tagged for a given day. Don't just make plans, make them happen!
